definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
see also/please refer to/compare (cf.)/to consult for reference
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon

(slang) Something awesome is about to happen! (originally, in a Japanese space battleship anime, it meant "Danger! High energy up ahead!" — a warning to either prepare for battle or take evasive action)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
